attributes.action: Remove All LGBTQ Teaching from KS3 and KS4 Relationships Curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that people should not be forced to learn about it if they don't want to. Secondary School students can still talk to peers about these topics but the rest of us shouldn't have it forced on us.
attributes.background: Remove all teachings about LGBTQ from KS3 and KS4 Curriculum. This means that all secondary school students do not have to be taught this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646173
